channel.title: I can't make NPC to Talk!

item.title: I can't make NPC to Talk!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

You have to remove one “}” after each of them.
like:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType[i] == 1835) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to MoonScape"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: I can't make NPC to Talk!

item.title: I can't make NPC to Talk!
item.dc:creator: @Dellagar Dellagar
item.description:
@Dellagar wrote:

Under the “moo”
It looks like this
:


if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}
				} 
					if (npcs[i].npcType[i] == 1835) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to MoonScape";
						}
					}
				}

item.source: I can't make NPC to Talk!

item.title: I can't make NPC to Talk!
item.dc:creator: @Dellagar Dellagar
item.description:
@Dellagar wrote:

Please help! Here’s my code:

					if (npcs[i].npcType[i] == 1835) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to MoonScape!";
						}
					}
				}

And the compiler says:


NPCHandler.java:268: 'class' or 'interface' expected
        public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) {
               ^
NPCHandler.java:340: 'class' or 'interface' expected
        public void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPCID)

               ^
NPCHandler.java:615: 'class' or 'interface' expected
        public static int worldmap2[][] = {
                      ^
NPCHandler.java:624: 'class' or 'interface' expected
public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez

       ^
NPCHandler.java:625: 'class' or 'interface' expected
public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2};
              ^
NPCHandler.java:627: 'class' or 'interface' expected
    public static int randomremoveschaos()
                  ^
NPCHandler.java:965: 'class' or 'interface' expected
}
^
NPCHandler.java:966: 'class' or 'interface' expected
^
8 errors

Read full topic
